addoninfo.title: Confluence
addoninfo.author: Jezz_X (Team XBMC)
addoninfo.description: Confluence is the default skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.
addoninfo.disclaimer: Confluence is the default skin for XBMC, removing it may cause issues
